reasoning: AIHA is a chronic hematologic condition with documented incidence of ~1.5 per 100k person-years for new diagnoses and prevalence of ~13 per 100k for existing cases. Reporting both metrics as AIHA persists chronically and incidence data is available from epidemiological studies.
source: Jaffe ES et al. Hematologic malignancies: pathology and molecular features. Advances in Pathology and Laboratory Medicine; combined with epidemiological studies from hematology registries
